It's worth noting that Unicron is a large reason why
Shadowcaster has been ressurected by Primus, well that
and to try to unite all the factions together as one
race and end the war.

 --- Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
From what we discussed on nbw online, the Guardians
are leftover 
troops from the first Beast Wars. They were twitched a
bit by 
outworldly powers and now act to preserve the planet.
They can be 
part of any group, but they are like brothers in their
cause. Of 
course, details can still be adjusted. Say your word!

You could use your character, provided the background
fits the jobs.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley
<bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> What exactly are you looking for?  Can I use a
character I have 
created for a similar purpose?
